Position

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Getting Start

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Class Properties
static position: static;
fixed position: fixed;
relative position: relative;
absolute position: absolute;
sticky position: sticky;
Static

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Static

Absolute


<div class="card ...">
    <div class="static ..." style="...">
        <p class="...">Static</p>
        <div class="absolute bottom-0 left-0..." style="...">
            <p class="...">Absolute</p>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Static Position

Relative

Static

Static

Absolute Position

Relative

Static

Absolute


<div class="card ..">
    <div class="relative ...">
        <p class="....">Relative</p>
        <div class="static ..." style="...">
            <p class="....">Static</p>
            <div class="static bottom-0 left-0 ..." style="...">
                <p class="....">Static</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="relative shadow-1 p-3">
        <p class="....">Relative</p>
        <div class="static ..." style="...">
            <p class="....">Static</p>
            <div class="absolute bottom-0 left-0 ..." style="...">
                <p class="....">Absolute</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Responsive

Breakpoints define how the display property should be defined depending on the screen size. Design is mobile first so smaller values can also apply to larger values e.g. md also applies to lg or xl if they are not explicitly defined.

  • sm: small screens e.g. phones
  • md: medium screens e.g. tablets
  • lg: large screens e.g. notebooks
  • xl: larger screens .e.g monitors
Static on a Small Screen

Resize to change position value.

Static

Absolute on medium screens / Static on small screens


<div class="card relative p-3 md:p-5">
    <p>Resize to chang position value.</p>
    <div class="static ..." style="...">
        <p class="...">Static</p>
        <div class="static md:absolute bottom-0 left-0 ..." style="...">
            <p class="...">Absolute in medium screens / Static in small screens</p>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
